MetaData:
Meta data that can be saved with the asset

You can query by GetMetaData function
AssetUserData: Array of user data stored with the asset
PreviewPoseAsset: The default skeletal mesh to use when previewing this asset - this only applies when you open Persona using this asset// @todo: note that this doesn't retarget right now

methods.name: FindMetaDataByClass
methods.doc: Returns the first metadata of the specified class

methods.name: SetPreviewSkeletalMesh
methods.doc: Sets or updates the preview skeletal mesh
